quote_first: Chief Superintendent Adam Dalgliesh turned from his inspection of the dead girl's clothes, his six feet two inches uncomfortably trapped between the foot of the bed and the wardrobe door. He looked at his watch. It was
quote_raw: Chief Superintendent Adam Dalgliesh turned from his inspection of the dead girl's clothes, his six feet two inches uncomfortably trapped between the foot of the bed and the wardrobe door. He looked at his watch. It was eight minutes past ten.
title: Shroud for a Nightingale
author: P.D. James

quote_first:
My watch is always a little fast, I said. "What time do you make it now?"
"
quote_raw:
My watch is always a little fast, I said. "What time do you make it now?"
"Ten eight."
"Ten eighteen by mine. You see."
title: The Quiet American
author: Graham Greene
